testcase.name: Search for a valid product
testcase.system-out: Given User open the application.............................................passed When User enters valid product "HP" into the search field...................passed And Clicks the search button................................................passed Then valid product should get displayed in search results...................passed

testcase.name: Search for non-existing product
testcase.system-out: Given User open the application.............................................passed When User enters non-existing product "Honda" into the search field.........passed And Clicks the search button................................................passed Then proper text informing the user about no product matching should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Search without providing any product
testcase.system-out: Given User open the application.............................................passed When User dont enter any product into the search field......................passed And Clicks the search button................................................passed Then proper text informing the user about no product matching should be displayed.passed
